title: Champion
description: A Trello-style task management app with drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates using MongoDB Change Streams.

title: Pickify
description: A smart product recommendation platform that helps users find top-rated products based on categories and preferences.

title: SwiftShip
description: A fully functional blog platform where users can read, post, and manage content with authentication.

title: Talent Trail
description: An e-commerce pet shop with filters, sorting, and product details page. Includes cart system and responsive UI.
